title: Reuters reveals scrambles for EV reboot with eye on Tesla
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters was first to report Toyota is considering a reboot of its electric-car strategy to better compete in a booming […]

The post Reuters reveals scrambles for EV reboot with eye on Tesla appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report Toyota is considering a reboot of its electric-car strategy to better compete in a booming market, and has halted some work on existing electric vehicle (EV) projects. The proposals under review, if adopted, would amount to a dramatic shift for Toyota and rewrite the $38-billion EV rollout plan the Japanese automaker announced last year to better compete with the likes of Tesla.

The post Reuters reveals scrambles for EV reboot with eye on Tesla appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
